pageTitle: UPDATE – Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, June 28, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Elmau, Germany

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Italy, Mario Draghi.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the G7 Working Session entitled Shaping International Cooperation: Multilateral and Digital Order/G20.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Schloss Elmau

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

Munich, Germany

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Madrid, Spain.

Munich International Airport

Closed to media

Madrid, Spain

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Madrid, Spain.

Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas Airport

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

8:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the official NATO Leaders’ arrivals.

Royal Palace

Note for media:

  • Host broadcast coverage

8:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the official family photo with Their Majesties the King and Queen of Spain and NATO Leaders.

Royal Palace

Note for media:

  • Host broadcast coverage

8:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a dinner hosted by His Majesty the King of Spain.

Royal Palace

Closed to media
